# Maya OS - Ubuntu Applications Implementation

## gui/ubuntu_apps.c
```c
#include "gui/ubuntu_apps.h"
#include "gui/ubuntu_desktop.h"
#include "gui/ubuntu_graphics.h"
#include "gui/ubuntu_input.h"
#include "kernel/memory.h"
#include "libc/string.h"
#include "libc/stdio.h"

// Application interface table
static ubuntu_app_interface_t app_interfaces[10];
static ubuntu_app_window_t* active_windows[32];
static int active_window_count = 0;

void ubuntu_apps_init(void) {
    // Initialize application interfaces
        app_interfaces[APP_FILES] = (ubuntu_app_interface_t){
                .init = ubuntu_files_init,
                        .render = ubuntu_files_render,
                                .handle_input = ubuntu_files_handle_input,
                                        .update = NULL,
                                                .cleanup = NULL
                                                    };
                                                        
                                                            app_interfaces[APP_TERMINAL] = (ubuntu_app_interface_t){
                                                                    .init = ubuntu_terminal_init,
                                                                            .render = ubuntu_terminal_render,
                                                                                    .handle_input = ubuntu_terminal_handle_input,
                                                                                            .update = NULL,
                                                                                                    .cleanup = NULL
                                                                                                        };
                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                app_interfaces[APP_TEXT_EDITOR] = (ubuntu_app_interface_t){
                                                                                                                        .init = ubuntu_text_editor_init,
                                                                                                                                .render = ubuntu_text_editor_render,
                                                                                                                                        .handle_input = ubuntu_text_editor_handle_input,
                                                                                                                                                .update = NULL,
                                                                                                                                                        .cleanup = NULL
                                                                                                                                                            };
                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                    app_interfaces[APP_CALCULATOR] = (ubuntu_app_interface_t){
                                                                                                                                                                            .init = ubuntu_calculator_init,
                                                                                                                                                                                    .render = ubuntu_calculator_render,
                                                                                                                                                                                            .handle_input = ubuntu_calculator_handle_input,
                                                                                                                                                                                                    .update = NULL,
                                                                                                                                                                                                            .cleanup = NULL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                };
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        app_interfaces[APP_SETTINGS] = (ubuntu_app_interface_t){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                .init = ubuntu_settings_init,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .render = ubuntu_settings_render,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                .handle_input = ubuntu_settings_handle_input,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .update = NULL,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                .cleanup = NULL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    };
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            printf("Ubuntu applications initialized\\n");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ubuntu_app_window_t* ubuntu_app_create(uint8_t app_id, int x, int y, int width, int height) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                if (active_window_count >= 32) return NULL;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ubuntu_app_window_t* app_window = (ubuntu_app_window_t*)kmalloc(sizeof(ubuntu_app_window_t));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (!app_window) return NULL;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    // Create window
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        app_window->window = window_create(x, y, width, height, "Application");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (!app_window->window) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    kfree(app_window);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            return NULL;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        app_window->app_id = app_id;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            app_window->minimized = 0;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                app_window->maximized = 0;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    app_window->focused = 1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        app_window->app_data = NULL;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Set window title based on app
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    switch (app_id) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            case APP_FILES:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Files");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            case APP_TERMINAL:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Terminal");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            case APP_TEXT_EDITOR:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Text Editor");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            case APP_CALCULATOR:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Calculator");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            case APP_SETTINGS:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Settings");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            default:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(app_window->title, "Application");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                window_set_title(app_window->window, app_window->title);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // Initialize application-specific data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (app_interfaces[app_id].init) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    app_interfaces[app_id].init(app_window);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                active_windows[active_window_count] = app_window;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    active_window_count++;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            return app_window;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            void ubuntu_app_destroy(ubuntu_app_window_t* app_window) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                if (!app_window) return;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // Cleanup application data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (app_interfaces[app_window->app_id].cleanup) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    app_interfaces[app_window->app_id].cleanup(app_window);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Remove from active windows
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    for (int i = 0; i < active_window_count; i++) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (active_windows[i] == app_window) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for (; i < active_window_count - 1; i++) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        active_windows[i] = active_windows[i + 1];
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                active_window_count--;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            break;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Destroy window
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    window_destroy(app_window->window);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            // Free application data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                if (app_window->app_data) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        kfree(app_window->app_data);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    kfree(app_window);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    // Files Application Implementation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    void ubuntu_files_init(ubuntu_app_window_t* app_window) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        files_app_data_t* data = (files_app_data_t*)kmalloc(sizeof(files_app_data_t));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (!data) return;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    strcpy(data->current_path, "/home");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data->file_count = 0;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            data->selected_file = -1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                data->scroll_offset = 0;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // Add some sample files
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            data->file_list[0] = (char*)kmalloc(64);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                strcpy(data->file_list[0], "Documents");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    data->file_list[1] = (char*)kmalloc(64);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(data->file_list[1], "Pictures");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            data->file_list[2] = (char*)kmalloc(64);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                strcpy(data->file_list[2], "Music");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    data->file_list[3] = (char*)kmalloc(64);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        strcpy(data->file_list[3], "Videos");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            data->file_list[4] = (char*)kmalloc(64);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                strcpy(data->file_list[4], "Desktop");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    data->file_count = 5;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            app_window->app_data = data;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            void ubuntu_files_render(ubuntu_app_window_t* app_window) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                if (!app_window || !app_window->window || !app_window->app_data) return;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        files_app_data_t* data = (files_app_data_t*)app_window->app_data;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            window_t* win = app_window->window;
